main event: A metallic, circular object was observed hovering over Surabaja, Indonesia for approximately 40 minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing.
interesting points: The object appeared to be metallic, circular in shape, and estimated to be 30-35 feet in diameter.
A hazy or misty vapor was observed emanating from the object.
The object was observed by personnel of the U.S. Naval Forces at Surabaja, Indonesia.
The report states that the sighting is considered authentic, as the personnel making the observation are of the highest caliber and their identification has been verified.
Other reports from various sources are said to corroborate this incident, leading to the conclusion that this is a genuine unknown object and not a hoax.
witnesses: personnel of the U.S. Naval Forces
